Typealiases.html#/s:6Drivit15completionB.name: completionBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:6Drivit15completionB.abstract: A representation of the type completionBlock that is commonly used around the SDK.

Typealiases.html#/s:6Drivit0A20LocationC.name: DrivitLocationCoordinate2D
Typealiases.html#/s:6Drivit0A20LocationC.abstract: DrivitLocationCoordinate2D is the SDK representation of a CLLocationCoordinate2D.

Typealiases.html#/s:6Drivit0A13MotionSet.name: DrivitMotionSetting
Typealiases.html#/s:6Drivit0A13MotionSet.abstract: Enum that defines if the user gave or not permission for the motion tracking.

Typealiases.html#/s:6Drivit0A22Backgroun.name: DrivitBackgroundTasksSetting
Typealiases.html#/s:6Drivit0A22Backgroun.abstract: Enum that defines if the user gave or not permission for background tasks.

Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:6Drivit9G.name: data
Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:6Drivit9G.abstract: The input data was corrupted (input stream not conforming to the zlib format or incorrect check value).

Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:6Drivit9G.name: buffer
Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:6Drivit9G.abstract: No progress is possible or there was not enough room in the output buffer.

Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:6Drivit9G.name: version
Structs/GzipError/Kind.html#/s:6Drivit9G.abstract: The zlib library version is incompatible with the version assumed by the caller.

Structs/CompressionLevel.html#/s:6Drivit.name: rawValue
Structs/CompressionLevel.html#/s:6Drivit.abstract: Compression level in the range of 0 (no compression) to 9 (maximum compression).

Structs/CompressionLevel.html.name: CompressionLevel
Structs/CompressionLevel.html.abstract: Compression level whose rawValue is based on the zlib’s constants.

Structs/GzipError.html.name: GzipError
Structs/GzipError.html.abstract: Errors on gzipping/gunzipping based on the zlib error codes.

Structs/DrivitLoginObject.html.name: DrivitLoginObject
Structs/DrivitLoginObject.html.abstract: DrivitLoginObject is the representation of the data needed to login in the Drivit Service.

Structs/DrivitLocationAccuracy.html.name: DrivitLocationAccuracy
Structs/DrivitLocationAccuracy.html.abstract: DrivitLocationAccuracy is the SDK representation of the horizontal and vertical CLLocationAccuracy.

Protocols/DrivitStatusManagerInterface.h.name: askForLocationApproval()
Protocols/DrivitStatusManagerInterface.h.abstract: Will ask for the approval of the location settings to the user. This will check first if this was previously asked, if so it will show a pront and try to redirect the user the settings screen.

Protocols/DrivitStatusManagerInterface.h.name: askForMotionApproval()
Protocols/DrivitStatusManagerInterface.h.abstract: Will ask for the approval of the motion settings to the user. This will check first if this was previously asked, if so it will show a pront and try to redirect the user the settings screen.

Protocols/DrivitStatusManagerInterface.h.name: askForBackgroundTaskApproval()
Protocols/DrivitStatusManagerInterface.h.abstract: Will ask for the approval of the background tasks settings to the user. This will check first if this was previously asked, if so it will show a pront and try to redirect the user the settings screen.

Protocols/DrivitLocationInterface.html#/.name: getLocation()
Protocols/DrivitLocationInterface.html#/.abstract: The location coordinates were this location was registered.

Protocols/DrivitLocationInterface.html#/.name: getTimestamp()
Protocols/DrivitLocationInterface.html#/.abstract: The date were this location was registered.

Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsEditorInterf.name: save()
Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsEditorInterf.abstract: Save the user settings that were edited.

Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.name: getLocationType()
Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.abstract: The location type setted in the settings.

Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.name: getDataPlan()
Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.abstract: The data plan type setted in the settings.

Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.name: getFuelPrice()
Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.abstract: The fuel price setted in the settings.

Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.name: getSoftTripsRecordingMode()
Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.abstract: The soft trip recording mode setted in the settings.

Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.name: getOrigin()
Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.abstract: The Address were the trip started, this address is an operation that can fail.

Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.name: getDestination()
Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.abstract: The Address were the trip ended, this address is an operation that can fail.

Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.name: getDistance()
Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.abstract: The distance calculated by all the locations that were registered for the trip.

Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.name: getConsumption()
Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.abstract: The consume is calculated depending on the distance and the vehicle consume.

Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.name: setOrigin(_:)
Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.abstract: Setup the Address were the trip started.

Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.name: setDestination(_:)
Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html#/.abstract: Setup the Address were the trip ended.

Protocols/DrivitTripEditPersistanceStore.name: save()
Protocols/DrivitTripEditPersistanceStore.abstract: Saves the trip if there was any edition.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getDistance()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: The distance calculated by all the locations that were registered for the trip.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getOriginAddress()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: The Address were the trip started, this address is an operation that can fail.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getDestinationAddress()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: The Address were the trip ended, this address is an operation that can fail.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getCost()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: The cost is calculated depending on the distance and the fuel cost.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getConsume()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: The consume is calculated depending on the distance and the vehicle consume.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getLastActivity()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: The last motion activity registered for this trip.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getStartingActivity()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: The starting motion activity registered for this trip.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getActivitys()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: An collection of all activitys registered for this trip.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getLocations()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: An collection of all locations registered for this trip.

Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.name: getEditorObject()
Protocols/DrivitTripInterface.html#/s:6D.abstract: Returns an object that will enable the edition of this trip.

Protocols/DrivitModelDelegate.html#/s:6D.name: didStartNewTrip(_:)
Protocols/DrivitModelDelegate.html#/s:6D.abstract: This event will happen when the SDK starts a new trip.

Protocols/DrivitModelDelegate.html#/s:6D.name: didFinishTrip(_:)
Protocols/DrivitModelDelegate.html#/s:6D.abstract: This event will happen when the SDK finish a trip.

Protocols/DrivitModelDelegate.html#/s:6D.name: didUpdateTrip(_:)
Protocols/DrivitModelDelegate.html#/s:6D.abstract: This event will happen when the SDK updates the running trip info.

Protocols/Student.html#/s:6Drivit7Studen.name: id
Protocols/Student.html#/s:6Drivit7Studen.abstract: Student ID that is referenced by an Int

Protocols/Student.html#/s:6Drivit7Studen.name: name
Protocols/Student.html#/s:6Drivit7Studen.abstract: Student Name that is referenced by an String

Protocols/Student.html#/s:6Drivit7Studen.name: lastName
Protocols/Student.html#/s:6Drivit7Studen.abstract: Student Last Name that is referenced by an String

Protocols/Student.html#/s:6Drivit7Studen.name: age
Protocols/Student.html#/s:6Drivit7Studen.abstract: Student Age that is referenced by an Int

Protocols/DrivitModelDelegate.html.name: DrivitModelDelegate
Protocols/DrivitModelDelegate.html.abstract: DrivitModelDelegate is the protocol that defines the delegation methods needed to handle events of the SDK.

Protocols/DrivitActivityInterface.html.name: DrivitActivityInterface
Protocols/DrivitActivityInterface.html.abstract: DrivitActivityInterface is the protocol that represents an motion activity

Protocols/DrivitTripEditPersistanceStore.name: DrivitTripEditPersistanceStore
Protocols/DrivitTripEditPersistanceStore.abstract: DrivitTripEditPersistanceStore is a protocol that enables the saving of a edited trip.

Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html.name: DrivitTripEditInterface
Protocols/DrivitTripEditInterface.html.abstract: DrivitTripEditInterface is a protocol that enables the edition of a trip.

Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.name: DrivitUserSettingsInterface
Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsInterface.ht.abstract: DrivitUserSettingsInterface is the protocol that gives access to the user settings information.

Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsEditorInterf.name: DrivitUserSettingsEditorInterface
Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsEditorInterf.abstract: DrivitUserSettingsEditorInterface is the protocol that enables the edition of the user settings.

Protocols/DrivitLocationInterface.html.name: DrivitLocationInterface
Protocols/DrivitLocationInterface.html.abstract: DrivitLocationInterface is the main representation of a Location object.

Protocols/DrivitStatusManagerInterface.h.name: DrivitStatusManagerInterface
Protocols/DrivitStatusManagerInterface.h.abstract: DrivitStatusManagerInterface gives access to permissions of the user needed by the SDK, and methods to ask for those permissions.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: isGzipped
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Whether the data is compressed in gzip format.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: gzipped(level:)
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Create a new Data object by compressing the receiver using zlib.

Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: gunzipped()
Extensions/Data.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Create a new Data object by decompressing the receiver using zlib.

Enums/DrivitSDKRecordingStatusSetting.ht.name: toggle()
Enums/DrivitSDKRecordingStatusSetting.ht.abstract: Toggles the enum between on and off.

Enums/DrivitLocationSetting.html#/s:6Dri.name: always
Enums/DrivitLocationSetting.html#/s:6Dri.abstract: The user gave permission to always be listening to location

Enums/DrivitLocationSetting.html#/s:6Dri.name: onlyWhenAppActive
Enums/DrivitLocationSetting.html#/s:6Dri.abstract: The user gave permission to only listen to location when the app is open

Enums/DrivitLocationSetting.html#/s:6Dri.name: rejected
Enums/DrivitLocationSetting.html#/s:6Dri.abstract: The user didnt gave permission to listen to location events.

Enums/DrivitLocationType.html#/s:6Drivit.name: GpsLowPrecision
Enums/DrivitLocationType.html#/s:6Drivit.abstract: Case that will use low precision GPS.

Enums/DrivitLocationType.html#/s:6Drivit.name: GpsHighPrecision
Enums/DrivitLocationType.html#/s:6Drivit.abstract: Case that will use high precision GPS.

Enums/DrivitDataPlan.html#/s:6Drivit0A8D.name: justWifi
Enums/DrivitDataPlan.html#/s:6Drivit0A8D.abstract: Case that will use just wifi network to upload files.

Enums/DrivitDataPlan.html#/s:6Drivit0A8D.name: whateverIsAvailable
Enums/DrivitDataPlan.html#/s:6Drivit0A8D.abstract: Case that will use any network to upload files.

Enums/Result.html#/s:6Drivit6ResultO7suc.name: success
Enums/Result.html#/s:6Drivit6ResultO7suc.abstract: The success indicates the success of an operation and can return an object of an type ‘T’

Enums/Result.html#/s:6Drivit6ResultO5err.name: error
Enums/Result.html#/s:6Drivit6ResultO5err.abstract: The error represents that there was an error in the operation and always returns an error object.

Enums/DIGPSPrecision.html#/s:6Drivit14DI.name: low
Enums/DIGPSPrecision.html#/s:6Drivit14DI.abstract: Case that will use low precision GPS.

Enums/DIGPSPrecision.html#/s:6Drivit14DI.name: high
Enums/DIGPSPrecision.html#/s:6Drivit14DI.abstract: Case that will use high precision GPS.

Enums/DIDataPlan.html#/s:6Drivit10DIData.name: wifi
Enums/DIDataPlan.html#/s:6Drivit10DIData.abstract: Case that will use just wifi network to upload files.

Enums/DIDataPlan.html#/s:6Drivit10DIData.name: any
Enums/DIDataPlan.html#/s:6Drivit10DIData.abstract: Case that will use any network to upload files.

Enums/DIDataPlan.html.name: DIDataPlan
Enums/DIDataPlan.html.abstract: Enum that defines the data plan that the user intends to use.

Enums/DIGPSPrecision.html.name: DIGPSPrecision
Enums/DIGPSPrecision.html.abstract: Enum that defines the location level of precision to be used.

Enums/DIRecordingMode.html.name: DIRecordingMode
Enums/DIRecordingMode.html.abstract: Enum that defines the recording status of the SDK

Enums/Result.html.name: Result
Enums/Result.html.abstract: Result of the operation that was running. This result is normally used in callbacks.

Enums/DrivitLocationManagerType.html.name: DrivitLocationManagerType
Enums/DrivitLocationManagerType.html.abstract: Location manager class. Will setup the manager and control the flow of the data from the Core Location, it will also set the level of accuracy needed.

Enums/DrivitDataPlan.html.name: DrivitDataPlan
Enums/DrivitDataPlan.html.abstract: Enum that defines the data plan that the user intends to use.

Enums/DrivitLocationType.html.name: DrivitLocationType
Enums/DrivitLocationType.html.abstract: Enum that defines the location level of precision to be used.

Enums.html#/s:6Drivit0A12CertificatesO.name: DrivitCertificates
Enums.html#/s:6Drivit0A12CertificatesO.abstract: An enum containing all the Root Certificate Authorities used by Drivit.

Enums/Base64Certificate.html.name: Base64Certificate
Enums/Base64Certificate.html.abstract: An enum containing all the Root Certificate Authorities Base64 encoded certificate data (PEM without tags).

Enums/DrivitLocationSetting.html.name: DrivitLocationSetting
Enums/DrivitLocationSetting.html.abstract: Enum that defines the levels of permissions that the user can give for location.

Enums/DrivitSDKRecordingStatusSetting.ht.name: DrivitSDKRecordingStatusSetting
Enums/DrivitSDKRecordingStatusSetting.ht.abstract: Enum that defines if the drivit SDK is currently active and alert.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC6signup.name: signup(auth:completion:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC6signup.abstract: Method that will return the current Login status of the user.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC30regis.name: registerForRemoteNotifications()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC30regis.abstract: Call this method to complete the registration process with Apple Push Notification Service and remote notifications for the device.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC28didRe.name: didReceiveRemoteNotification(userInfo:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC28didRe.abstract: It’s called only when your app is running in the foreground.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC28didRe.name: didReceiveRemoteNotification(userInfo:completionHandler:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC28didRe.abstract: Tells the SDK that a remote notification arrived that indicates there is data to be fetched.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC11getSe.name: getSettings()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC11getSe.abstract: Returns the status of the framework. This class will give you the status of the framework and some permissions needed by the framework.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC14force.name: forceTripStart()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC14force.abstract: This method will force a start of a Trip and will start saving location and activity of the user.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC13force.name: forceTripStop()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC13force.abstract: This method will force the SDK to stop a running trip if this exists, if a trip is not running the method will not do anything.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC11runni.name: runningTrip()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC11runni.abstract: Call this method to get the trip that is running at the moment.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC11setDe.name: setDelegate(_:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC11setDe.abstract: To setup a delegate to listen to events given by the SDK. This events are for example: Trip did start, Trip did stop

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC12getPa.name: getPastTrips()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC12getPa.abstract: Get a list of last trips that were registered, sorted by Date.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC14hasFi.name: hasFilesToSinc(TripGUID:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC14hasFi.abstract: This method will say if there is any files needed to upload with the metadata of this trip.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC15force.name: forceSyncOfTrip(TripGUID:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC15force.abstract: Force the sync of the files that still need to be uploaded to the server, if the trip has no files to be synced this method will not do anything.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC22force.name: forceSyncOfEditedTrips()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC22force.abstract: Force the sync of trips metadata that were edited and need to be uploaded to the server.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC8sendUs.name: sendUser()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC8sendUs.abstract: Force the sync of user settings that were edited.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC13getUs.name: getUserEditor()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC13getUs.abstract: Method that will get the user settings and a class that will enabble the edition of those settings.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC45appli.name: applicationDiStartWithBackgroundSessionEvents(SessionIdentifier:completion:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC45appli.abstract: Required method to be added to the appDelegate. This method will inform the SDK when an event happens with the sync of the files.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC29appli.name: applicationDidWakeWithOptions(_:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC29appli.abstract: Required method to be added to the appDelegate. This method will inform the SDK when an event happens in the regions.

Classes/Drivit.html.name: Drivit
Classes/Drivit.html.abstract: Public interface for the client. This will be the main access to the Drivit SDK funcionalities.

Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
